definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The two promoted the film at the Cannes Film Festival that spring.
sentences.chinese: 那个春天，两人将这部电影带到了戛纳电影节上。

sentences.english: Her Cannes frames epitomise elegance and timeless classiness.
sentences.chinese: 她在戛纳戴的镜框呈现出优雅和永恒的时髦感。

sentences.english: Who can we expect to see on the Croisette this year?
sentences.chinese: 今年戛纳电影节我们能看到哪些明星？

sentences.english: Nice, Marseille, Cannes and St-Tropez are among the most visited spots.
sentences.chinese: 尼斯，马赛，戛纳，和圣特鲁佩斯都是热门的观光点。

sentences.english: West Lake took hold of the hands of the blue sea. Monkey Lele staged a shinning debut in Cannes, France.
sentences.chinese: 西子湖牵手蔚蓝海岸，美猴乐乐闪亮登场法国戛纳。

sentences.english: The famous cannes multiplex is set in the edge of coconut trees.
sentences.chinese: 著名的戛纳电影城就掩映在海岸线边的椰树下。

sentences.english: Her film was premiered in Cannes Festival.
sentences.chinese: 她的影片在戛纳电影节首次放映。

sentences.english: The best place to discover the new summer trends is Cannes.
sentences.chinese: 戛纳是发现夏季流行新趋势的最佳地点。

sentences.english: The largest and probably best-known festival is held in Cannes, France.
sentences.chinese: 最大而且很可能是最著名的电影节在法国戛纳举办。

sentences.english: Chinese actress Fan Bing Bing arrives for the closing ceremony of the 63rd Cannes film festival.
sentences.chinese: 中国女演员范冰冰到达的第63届戛纳电影节闭幕式。

sentences.english: The local weather bureau has also forecast rain on the opening day.
sentences.chinese: 据当地气象部门预测，电影节开幕时戛纳将是雨天。
戛纳之后就让他“称王”吧。

sentences.english: Hottest Actresses at the 64th Cannes Film Festival：Gong Li.
sentences.chinese: 巩俐入选第64届戛纳电影节十大最受欢迎女演员。

sentences.english: Photographers work a photocall at the 62nd Cannes Film Festival.
sentences.chinese: 摄影师在第62届戛纳电影节的拍照时间工作。

sentences.english: It has been a very good year for French films at Cannes.
sentences.chinese: 今年戛纳，法国电影是丰收年。

sentences.english: PHD has had an outstanding result at this year's Cannes Lions International Festival of Media Lions.
sentences.chinese: PHD在今年戛纳国际广告节上取得了突出的成绩。

definition: Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
Silver Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
Silver Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
